title: BOOTS No7 Photo Fix Wrinkle Filler & Primer
description: This fabulous new and innovative primer reduces the appearance of the signs of aging instantly! The results can be seen in just 10 minutes and they last for up to 8 hours. A unique complex combines filling properties with light diffusing particles to smooth fine lines and wrinkles and put uneven skin tone and pores into soft focus. 1 U.S. fl. oz. How to Use: Use as an illuminator by carefully patting on the face over the top of foundation where the light naturally hits the skin, such as the cheek bones. Or mix with foundation before application to create a radiant finish.

title: Dermablend Quick Fix Concealer SPF 30, Ivory
description: Have quick, smooth and easy coverage with Dermablend Quick Fix Concealer SPF 30 - Ivory.A lightweight formula with high purity pigments, Quick-Fix offers improved skin tone shades and texture with long lasting wear. For moderate to major localized skin flaws, Quick-Fix provides buildable coverage that won't enhance the appearance of wrinkles or pores.Ivory is for fair skin tones with pink undertones....

title: Neutrogena Ageless Essentials Continuous Hydration, Night, 1.7 Ounce
description: Timereleased hydrators. Lasting, nourish, moisturize. Dermatologist recommended.
